definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Money, eat in the restaurant Paofan.
sentences.chinese: 有钱的时候，在酒家吃泡饭。

sentences.english: You can eat dim sum at Guangzhou Restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在广州酒家吃点心。

sentences.english: Is there any lobsters in Jumbo today?
sentences.chinese: 今天“珍宝”酒家有龙虾吗？

sentences.english: It's on your left. It's next to the parking lot.
sentences.chinese: 威克牛排酒家在你的左手边，紧挨着停车场。

sentences.english: But many wineries are having a hard time getting a line on Chinese oenophiles.
sentences.chinese: 但很多酒商很难获得中国品酒家的理解。

sentences.english: Oh, he's a nice man. He's manager of Fitzgerald and Moy's.
sentences.chinese: 噢，他是费莫酒家的经理，人很不错。

sentences.english: The life of the resort which he managed was his life.
sentences.chinese: 他经营的酒家，那才是他生活的中心。

sentences.english: Best Chinese Seafood & Hotpot restaurant in New Saigon City Centre Phu My Hung area.
sentences.chinese: 胡志明市新城区富美兴最好的中餐海鲜火锅酒家。

sentences.english: What did you think of the food at Vic's?
sentences.chinese: 你们觉得威克酒家的菜怎么样？
就是他给我们推荐的威克牛排酒家。

sentences.english: Good evening. Welcome to Jade Restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 晚上好，欢迎光临临翠园酒家。

sentences.english: Huibinlou restaurant is a two-story building.
sentences.chinese: 会宾楼酒家是座二层小楼。

sentences.english: Our restaurant has high-class seafood flown in every day and is ready to host the world.
sentences.chinese: 本酒家天天空运高级海鲜，随时准备款待世界宾客。

sentences.english: There's a big sign in front of it.
sentences.chinese: 酒家正门挂着一块很大的招牌。

sentences.english: Apricot Blossom Wineshop' is written on the board of the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 饭店的门匾上写着杏花酒家四个金色的大字。

sentences.english: Red chardonnay was frustrated in the restaurant drink, was the shopkeeper for arrears.
sentences.chinese: 赤霞郁郁不得志的在酒家喝酒，却被掌柜追讨欠款。

definition: erhua variant of 飯館|饭馆[fan4 guan3]
